# Tokamak Hiring System

> AI-powered recruitment automation for Ethereum Layer 2 teams. No resumes — evaluate candidates by real deliverables (Track B).

## What is this?

Tokamak Hiring System is an open-source applicant tracking and candidate sourcing platform built for Web3/blockchain teams. It replaces traditional resume-based hiring with deliverable-based evaluation (Track B), where candidates submit working code, demos, or documentation instead of CVs.

## Key Features

- **Track B Evaluation**: Candidates are scored on Problem Definition, Implementation, and Deliverable quality across 5 weighted dimensions (Technical Completeness, Ecosystem Fit 2x, Tokenomics Impact 1.5x, Innovation, AI Proficiency)
- **GitHub Monitor**: Automatically detects external developers who star, fork, submit PRs, or open issues on tokamak-network repositories
- **LinkedIn Outbound Sourcing**: Web search-based discovery of blockchain developers with automatic LinkedIn profile matching
- **Team Auto-Recommendation**: AI matches candidates to the best internal reviewer based on GitHub activity analysis of 15+ team members
- **Multi-User Support**: Admin/reviewer/viewer roles with activity tracking

## Tech Stack

- Backend: Python 3.9+, FastAPI, SQLite, PyGithub
- Frontend: Next.js 16, React, Tailwind CSS
- AI: OpenAI-compatible API for candidate evaluation
- Search: Brave Search API for LinkedIn sourcing

## Who built this?

Tokamak Network — an Ethereum Layer 2 protocol team focused on on-demand, tailored L2 solutions. 15 engineers, 70+ active repositories, 2000+ commits every two weeks.

## Links

- Website: https://tokamak.network
